website_summaries.verdict: The drawer design is popular for its versatility. A very affordable model.
pros: Classic DIY or mechanic’s toolbox offers quick, easy access and plenty of space
cons: Steel is thinner than that of some competing tool boxes

website_summaries.verdict: Cantilevered drawer design is popular for its versatility. A very affordable model.
pros: Classic DIY/ mechanic’s toolbox offers quick, easy access and plenty of space
cons: Steel is thinner than that of some competing tool boxes

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! An origional, old school, real metal tool box. I didn't know these were still made. So glad that the Mrs. reminded me of them. It'll probably still be around even after I've gone on into the afterlife. I'm stoked.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: The best tool box I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous tool box. Everything can be seen at once when you fold out the compartments. It is a great organizer too so no screwdriver gets misplaced. Please not that this is a steel box and very sturdy and, of course heavy. I recommend that you put it where you expect to keep it permanently, then fill it up. Mine is now filled to the brim and I can't lift it (being a 77-year old grandmother). It weighs about 40 pounds filled with my tools. It's a beauty and so colorful - really nice finish and smooth hardware.
customer_reviews.author: giddyupirish

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool box. I got it to store my adult toys in and I really like how it all opens up so you can see everything inside no problem. It fits well under the table by my bed and I can easily see myself taking it with me places I'd want my toys; and, coupled with the fact you can padlock it I have no worries prying eyes might get inside. It is at least 10 pounds, though, so I wouldn't want to carry it long if it gets much more full, lol. The quality is wonderful and I expect this tool box to last a good long time!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Good simple rugged tool box.
customer_reviews.text: Works great thus far. Simple, rugged and looks it’d last. Suggestion to manufacturer : - would be great if the covered sections had dividers. - and o.... did you consider selling the toolbox in other colors? Blue? Orange? Brown? Yellow?
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great tool box. It holds most of my tools...hammer, rachets, sockets, screw drivers, C clamps, vise grip, rubber mallet, small crowbar, small sludge hammer, chisel etc. Liked it so much I bought a 2nd one. Very strong and sturdy and you can pad lock it if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Rollow

customer_reviews.title: Came used, cheap build quality
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this item but noticed there were small chips in the paint and event some bent portions (probably used). Most importantly, both cantilever trays do not line up when folded closed; it's as if one side is bent in the direction perpendicular to the direction they fold. The trays are decently deep but leave much to be desired in terms of thickness/strength. Would I recommend? Probably not. We'll see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not bad quality for the price. If you're looking for Snap-on quality then move on. If you are a professional who is constantly loading and unloading your boxes every day then this may not be your cup of tea either. I wasn't ready to spend the $400 for the couple of boxes so I bought these instead and hope they will do till then. I hope to get a couple years out of these with modifications.
customer_reviews.author: Todd F

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My old metal toolbox of 15 years, was wearing out. I transferred my tools to this one picked it up and a rivet instantly pulled out. The bottom compartment crashed downwards, pinching my finger between the handle and the sharp edge of the small piece of metal intended for a lock. I am a 58 year old who still holds up to working heavy construction. It badly bruised my finger. Many people would probably end up with a bad break. This tool box is not just unusuable crud, it is highly dangerous as well. Worst product I have ever bought on Amazon, ever.
customer_reviews.author: david froh

customer_reviews.title: Great tool box design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool box. Sturdy and well built. I like the tray design tool boxes which work much better than sliding drawers as I tend to over fill the trays. Hip tray boxes will not get stuck with tools that would lock a drawer shut. I am getting ready to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: MissInformed

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and it’s absolutely perfect. You can see everything inside, the way it opens up makes everything visible and there are different storage options for different size tools. It keeps everything organized. This is the best tool box out there for the price. I almost bought something else and I am glad I decided on this one
customer_reviews.author: L. Arakelian

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband who is very picky and hard to buy for. He loved it. Loved the color, the size, and the expand ability of the box. He put it right to use and it fit everything. He said it fits his needs perfectly and he can find anything he puts in this tool box so easily because of the way it opens. So wives & girlfriends it’s a great buy if a simple tool box is all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thinking Outside of the (Tool-)Box.
customer_reviews.text: It's almost too pretty for its intended use-I got it to secure my jewelry in something strong but that has a handle in case of emergencies. I got a professional makeup kit for my jewelry but already it's ful (it has a strap handle). It's pretty bright red and who would suspect it's full of jewelry?
customer_reviews.author: LeaveThisSpaceBlank

customer_reviews.title: Well built, good way to organize tools. A bit heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Well built, good way to organize tools. It's pretty heavy, but if you want something with capacity that's well built and stands up to abuse it's likely to be heavy. I also purchased some tool box liner to keep tools from sliding around which was a very good idea.
customer_reviews.author: rgprints

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: I like how it opens up to see everything. It is made well and is heavy. After a while of carrying it and it's full of tools the handle will hurt your hands. So put on a pair of gloves or get one of those handle wraps they use on suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: Sunswhisper

customer_reviews.title: LEGO storage
customer_reviews.text: Got this for LEGO storage ... it fits waaaay more than I expected. Nice that it opens up to see everything inside. Not like drawers. I wish this came in a purple or white for my daughters LEGO/match her room. Such a great little box for LEGO!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good tool box
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good tool box, and I am happy with this purchase. It's great that all the trays are out when you open the handles. It's a little twisty, because of all the pivot points, but I think that it will last, and that even if it fails, I can fix it with a rivet.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd F.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Looked decent for the cost at first. But as soon as I unfolded it the rivets popped out. I'm debating whether to return it right away ore try for a few days...
customer_reviews.author: Ousmane

customer_reviews.title: Rivets
customer_reviews.text: Bottom rivet came out but put a new pop rivet in and the thing holds up great. Would of liked to of had machined rivets on the bottom row too but it's a good product. I enjoy the cantilever box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love  this  thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I really wanted a 200 dollar japanese version of a toolbox but this gets the job done well for a whole lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Really rugged and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great design made of heavy steel that fits a lot of tools and allows for organization. This is by far the best one I found, over all the usual brand versions.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool box
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. This is now my go-to project tool box. Cantilever shelves allow me to place similar tools together and easily see what is where. I can tell from the build that this tool box will be in service for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: jarea

customer_reviews.title: Light and strong enough to hold the tools - recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is well constructed and used right gauge of steel sheet. It doesn't feel flimsy. I primarily use to keep all the tools needed for brake job including caliper and router change. I don't here any rattling sound due to faulty build. I recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Murthy VVVS

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was 2 inches wider. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my business tools. I love everything about it. The only thing I wish for is that it would be about 2 inches wider. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Clean Hood Pros

customer_reviews.title: bigger than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but super sturdy. Great finish. Can store more tools than you think, easy to organize with the 5 sections.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Nice like it ALOT
customer_reviews.text: Great reminds me of old school tool boxes Kinda like your grand dads.
customer_reviews.author: JIM W MATTHEWS

customer_reviews.title: excellent steel tool box
customer_reviews.text: very good storage capacity, multiple trays allows one to find proper tool without spending tons of time rooting through entire box. Lost all my tools in a plastic tool box destroyed in a fire, tools in this box will survive same fire. Likely will buy another one for the rest of my tools.
customer_reviews.author: rockdoc

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, It is not cheep or flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for SAE sockets and wrenches on one side & Metric on the other side. Air tools on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Verl

customer_reviews.title: Great toolbox for the money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tool box. Bright, cheery red. I can see all my tools.
customer_reviews.author: FUTURESKINNYGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Not plastic!
customer_reviews.text: it's made of metal. I love that its made of metal. I need another.. or a bigger one as well, but i actually leave this one out, cuz i love that it's real
customer_reviews.author: Doli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel tool box.
customer_reviews.text: A must buy. Bought it for my step-son and my husband wants one too now. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Camarena

customer_reviews.title: It is very early to know how it will perform.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Old fashion simple proven design, Light weight Cons: Not very sturdy Expensive
customer_reviews.author: ARASTOU JAVID

customer_reviews.title: pratical design & value
customer_reviews.text: This is my #1 go-to box when making service calls. All my favorite sockets & wrenches are very well organized and easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gray

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this and it organizes tools for easy locating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with tool box and price!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for a box to keep in my pick up truck. I mounted rubber liner in box and trays to keep it quiet.
customer_reviews.author: JIMMC

customer_reviews.title: Where and How to use it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice box, thanks for the deal of lowering the price for the box. Best Regards, Thomas J Lund
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. My husband loves it. I got it for Father's Day 2019 I was so tired of all his tools being in a bag
customer_reviews.author: Ree Wiseman

product_meta.title: Goplus 20-Inch Portable 5-Tray Cantilever Metal Tool Box Steel Tool Chest Cabinet, Red
product_meta.description:
Product Description:
This steel cantilever toolbox opens up to reveal 5 trays for easy access to tools and parts. The unit has a powder coat paint finish and a full length steel handle. It is easy to carry and is made from durable steel. All steel construction is finished in durable powder coat paint for years of service. And it is a great storage piece for home, office, warehouse and jobsites! 

Features: 
5 cabinets hold a variety of tool
Easy grip handle makes transportation a snap
Attractive powder coat red paint finish
Durable steel box store different tools up to 66lbs
Creates the most efficient way to keep your often-used tools organized
Easy to assemble

Specifications: 
Color: Red
Overall Dimension: 19.5"x 8.1"x 11"
Net Weight: 10.5lbs
Total weight capacity: 66 lbs
Upper tray weight capacity: 11 lbs; Bottom tray weight capacity: 22 lbs
feature_bullets: 【5 Cabinets for Large Store Capacity】This steel cantilever toolbox equipped with 5 trays for easy access to tools and parts, which can store different tools up to 66lbs. It will be a good choice for you with tools around.

【Durable Steel with Convenient Handle】The heavy-duty tool box is made of solid steel. And with a full length steel handle, it is easy to carry. Besides, all steel construction is finished in durable powder coat paint for years of use.

【Tool Organizer】It can be used to organize your screw drivers, wrenches, drill bits and other tools in your tool shed or workshop. It creates the most efficient way to keep your often-used tools organized.
【Simple Installation】With the instruction, it is only need a few steps to finish the installation with the instruction. It is a great storage piece for home, office, warehouse and jobsites.
【Easy to Clean】Red powder coat paint on all part of item is good for preventing scratch and chemical resistance. Sleek surface makes it easy to clean, just wipe with a damp sponge or cloth.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars89 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
